content: and knit one stitch to close the gap pick up and knit 18 stitches from along the edge of the heel flap knit until the end of needle 2 you should now be at the beginning of the round gusset decrease round 1 keep in pattern across needle 1 these are the instep on needle 2 work decreases as follows k1 ssk knit to last 3 stitches k2tog k1 round 2 knit all stitches repeat rounds 1 and 2 until there are 32 stitches on needle 2 64 stitches total foot continue knitting every round while working curious cable between markers until foot reaches desired length toe round 1 *k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before the end of the needle k2tog k1* to end of round round 2 knit all stitches repeat rounds 1 and 2 until 32 stitches remain then work round 1 every round until 16 stitches remain graft using kitchener stitch and weave in ends © 2018 two birds knitting co please do not copy or distribute this pattern without permission �4 from the designer email twobirdsknitting@gmail com curious cable left © 2018 two birds knitting co please do not copy or distribute this pattern without permission �5 from thee designer email twobirdsknitting@gmail com curious cable right © 2018 two birds knitting co please do not copy or distribute this pattern without permission �6 from thee designer email twobirdsknitting@gmail com
